EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-12-02-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Tampa-Bay.ES-2017 - (6 Weeks Out) Tampa.E
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: Lightning v. Sharks Executive Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-tampabay]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're getting ready to host an exclusive event with our friends at Cisco as the Tampa Bay Lightning take on the San Jose Sharks. At Turbonomic, our users are the core of our organization. They drive the evolution of our technology, shape our company culture, and even inspired out name change from VMTurbo to Turbonomic last August. Join us this holiday season to learn about what it means to be a Turbonomic customer. Tampa Bay Lightning vs San Jose Sharks
Where: Amalie Arena 401 Channelside Dr., Tampa, FL 33602 Saturday, December 2nd 6:00pm
Save the date for December 2nd at 6:00PM by registering at the following link: https://turbonomic.com/vip-tampabay <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-tampabay]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
